misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo is a well-known figure in the world of golf, representing Keimola Golf with distinction. A familiar face at the Hector Trophée, he has participated in 8 editions of the tournament, demonstrating a consistent presence and commitment to the event.

Timo is famous for being an ambassador of the AimPoint method, and his dedication to refining his technique is evident to all who have the pleasure of watching him play. With 3 Hector Trophée victories under his belt, Timo has proven his ability to perform under pressure and lead his team to success.

While Timo will not be participating in Hector Trophée 2025, his contributions to the tournament over the years have left an indelible mark. His absence will be noted by fellow competitors and fans alike, although there remains a possibility of a last-minute change to the field.

Known for his sportsmanship and amiable nature, Timo is a popular figure among his peers. His presence on the course is always a welcome sight, and his insights into the game are highly valued by those who have the opportunity to learn from him.
